Projects Residential

BPTP - THE AMAARIO
AT 37 D, DWAKA EXPRESSWAY, GURUGRAM

BPTP at 37D Dwarka Expressway is a prestigious real estate development in Gurugram, offering a harmonious blend of luxury, convenience, and modern living. Located along the rapidly developing Dwarka Expressway, this project enjoys excellent connectivity to Delhi, IGI Airport, and major business hubs, making it a prime choice for professionals and families alike. The development features a variety of meticulously designed residential units, including spacious apartments and elegant penthouses, all crafted with high-quality materials and contemporary architecture. Residents can indulge in a range of world-class amenities, such as a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool, beautifully landscaped gardens, a clubhouse, and dedicated children’s play areas, enhancing their lifestyle and comfort. BPTP at 37D also prioritizes sustainability with eco-friendly initiatives like rainwater harvesting, solar energy utilization, and energy-efficient systems. With its strategic location, luxurious offerings, and commitment to sustainability, BPTP at 37D Dwarka Expressway stands out as a distinguished choice for discerning homebuyers and investors in the Gurugram region.

Enquire Now

DLF PRIVANA
SECTOR 77 GURUGRAM

DLF Privana, located in Sector 77, Gurugram, is a premier residential development that epitomizes luxury and tranquility. Strategically situated in one of Gurugram’s most promising areas, DLF Privana offers excellent connectivity to major business hubs, shopping centers, educational institutions, and healthcare facilities. The project features thoughtfully designed low-rise floors that blend modern architecture with spacious interiors, providing an exclusive and serene living experience. Each unit is meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and finishes, ensuring a sophisticated lifestyle for its residents. DLF Privana boasts a range of world-class amenities, including a well-equipped fitness center, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, a clubhouse, and dedicated children’s play areas. The development emphasizes green living with eco-friendly features like rainwater harvesting, solar energy utilization, and ample green spaces. With its prime location, luxurious residences, and commitment to sustainability, DLF Privana in Sector 77 stands out as an exceptional choice for homebuyers and investors seeking a serene yet connected lifestyle in Gurugram.

Enquire Now

GODREJ JARDINIA

SECTOR 146 NOIDA

Godrej Jardina, situated in Sector 146, Noida, is a luxurious residential development that offers a harmonious blend of modern living and natural serenity. Nestled in one of Noida’s most sought-after sectors, Godrej Jardina provides excellent connectivity to major business districts, educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and entertainment hubs. The project features meticulously designed residences, ranging from spacious apartments to elegant penthouses, each crafted with contemporary architecture and premium finishes to ensure a sophisticated lifestyle. Residents of Godrej Jardina can indulge in a plethora of world-class amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool, beautifully landscaped gardens, a clubhouse, and dedicated children’s play areas. The development also prioritizes sustainability with eco-friendly initiatives such as rainwater harvesting, solar energy utilization, and abundant green spaces, promoting a healthy and sustainable living environment. With its prime location, luxurious offerings, and commitment to sustainability, Godrej Jardina in Sector 146 stands out as a distinguished choice for discerning homebuyers and investors seeking a blend of tranquility and urban convenience in Noida

M3M CAPITAL
AT SECTOR 113, SMART CITY AIRPORT; GURUGRAM

M3M Capital, located in Sector 113, Gurugram, is a distinguished real estate development that exemplifies modern luxury and strategic convenience. Positioned along the Dwarka Expressway, this project offers seamless connectivity to Delhi, Indira Gandhi International Airport, and major commercial hubs, making it an ideal choice for professionals and families. M3M Capital features a range of meticulously designed residential units, including stylish apartments and sophisticated penthouses, each crafted with high-quality materials and contemporary architecture. The development boasts an array of world-class amenities, such as a state-of-the-art fitness center, a swimming pool, landscaped gardens, a clubhouse, and dedicated children’s play areas, all designed to enhance the living experience. Sustainability is a key focus, with eco-friendly features like rainwater harvesting, solar energy utilization, and energy-efficient systems incorporated throughout the project. With its prime location, luxurious living spaces, and commitment to sustainable practices, M3M Capital in Sector 113 stands out as a premier choice for discerning homebuyers and investors in Gurugram.

M3M CROWN
Sector 111 DWARKA EXPRESSWAY

M3M Crown, situated in Dwarka, is a prestigious real estate venture that redefines contemporary living with its blend of elegance and convenience. Positioned strategically in one of Dwarka’s most sought-after locations, M3M Crown offers seamless connectivity to key areas like Delhi, Gurgaon, and the Indira Gandhi International Airport, making it an ideal choice for urban dwellers and commuters alike. The project features meticulously designed residential units, ranging from luxurious apartments to opulent penthouses, each crafted with modern architecture and premium finishes to provide a sophisticated living experience. Residents of M3M Crown can indulge in a plethora of world-class amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, clubhouse, and dedicated children’s play areas, all aimed at enhancing their lifestyle. Sustainability is integrated into the project’s design, with eco-friendly features like rainwater harvesting and energy-efficient systems implemented throughout. With its prime location, luxurious offerings, and commitment to sustainability, M3M Crown in Dwarka stands out as a distinguished choice for discerning homebuyers seeking a blend of comfort and convenience in the heart of the city.

Enquire Now

M3M GOLF HILLS
SECTOR 79, GURUGRAM

Welcome to M3M Golf Hills, your gateway to luxurious living in Sector 79, Gurugram. Discover an unparalleled residential experience in this premier project, featuring exquisitely crafted apartments with modern architecture, spacious layouts, and high-end finishes.

Strategically located in Sector 79, M3M Golf Hills offers seamless connectivity to major business hubs, top-tier educational institutions, and premier shopping and entertainment destinations. Residents can indulge in world-class amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, a luxurious swimming pool, beautifully landscaped gardens, and exclusive recreational facilities. Enjoy the serene environment with stunning views of the golf course, providing a peaceful retreat from the city’s hustle and bustle.

M3M Golf Hills is more than just a home; it’s a lifestyle destination where luxury meets convenience. Invest in your dream home at M3M Golf Hills and embrace a life of sophistication and serenity in one of Gurugram’s most coveted locations.

Enquire Now

M3M MANSION
AT 113 SMART CITY NEW DELHI

M3M Mansion, situated within the ambit of the 113 Smart City project, stands as a pinnacle of luxury and innovation in Gurugram’s real estate landscape. Nestled in the heart of this futuristic development, M3M Mansion offers residents an unparalleled living experience that seamlessly integrates modern amenities with smart urban living. With its strategic location along the Dwarka Expressway, the project ensures easy connectivity to Delhi, Gurgaon, and the Indira Gandhi International Airport, making it an ideal choice for urban professionals and families seeking convenience without compromise. M3M Mansion features meticulously crafted residences, ranging from spacious apartments to sprawling penthouses, each designed to provide residents with the utmost comfort, style, and functionality. Residents can indulge in a plethora of world-class amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pools, landscaped gardens, clubhouse, and dedicated children’s play areas, all meticulously curated to cater to their every need and desire. Sustainability is a core focus of M3M Mansion, with eco-friendly features such as rainwater harvesting and energy-efficient systems seamlessly integrated into the project’s design. With its blend of luxury, innovation, and sustainability, M3M Mansion at 113 Smart City sets a new standard for urban living in Gurugram, offering residents a lifestyle that is as smart as it is sophisticated.

Enquire Now

NIMBUS THE PALM VILLAGE
YAMUNA EXPRESSWAY

Nimbus The Palm Village is a distinguished residential enclave that epitomizes luxury and tranquility in the heart of Noida. Nestled amidst lush greenery and serene surroundings, this prestigious development offers a serene retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life while ensuring easy access to urban conveniences.

The Palm Village features meticulously designed residences, ranging from spacious apartments to elegant villas, each crafted with contemporary architecture and premium finishes to provide residents with a sophisticated living experience. Residents of The Palm Village can indulge in a wide array of world-class amenities, including a clubhouse, swimming pools, landscaped gardens, fitness center, sports facilities, and dedicated children’s play areas, all designed to enhance their lifestyle. The project’s strategic location ensures seamless connectivity to major business hubs, educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and entertainment options, making it an ideal choice for families and professionals alike.

With its blend of luxury, tranquility, and convenience, Nimbus The Palm Village sets a new benchmark for upscale living in Noida, offering residents a harmonious blend of comfort and style amidst nature’s embrace.

Enquire Now

TARC (KAILASA)
AT PATEL ROAD; NEW DELHI

TARC Kailasa at Patel Road stands as a beacon of contemporary living, offering a range of meticulously crafted residences tailored to meet the diverse needs of modern homeowners. The development boasts a variety of housing options, from cozy apartments perfect for young professionals to spacious penthouses ideal for growing families or those seeking expansive living spaces. Beyond its luxurious residences, TARC Kailasa also prioritizes lifestyle amenities designed to cater to every aspect of residents’ well-being. A state-of-the-art fitness center provides opportunities for exercise and relaxation, while the swimming pool offers a refreshing escape from the city’s hustle and bustle. The landscaped gardens provide tranquil spaces for residents to unwind, while the clubhouse serves as a social hub for community gatherings and events. One of TARC Kailasa’s key strengths lies in its strategic location along Patel Road, offering residents easy access to a plethora of amenities and conveniences. Whether it’s shopping centers, dining options, educational institutions, or healthcare facilities, everything residents need is within reach. Additionally, the development’s proximity to major transportation networks ensures effortless connectivity to other parts of the city, making commuting a breeze.

Enquire Now

TARC TRIPUNDRA
NEAR IGI AIRPORT, NEW DELHI

Introducing TARC Tripundra, a distinguished residential enclave located near the Indira Gandhi International Airport, offering a seamless blend of comfort and convenience.

Situated in close proximity to one of India’s busiest airports, TARC Tripundra provides residents with unparalleled accessibility to domestic and international travel hubs. This strategically positioned development caters to the needs of modern travelers, offering a range of thoughtfully designed residences that serve as ideal homes for frequent flyers, aviation professionals, and those who value proximity to the airport.

TARC Tripundra’s residences are crafted with contemporary architecture and premium finishes, providing residents with a sanctuary of luxury and tranquility amidst the bustling energy of the airport vicinity. From cozy apartments to spacious penthouses, each unit is designed to optimize space, natural light, and functionality, ensuring a comfortable living experience for residents.

Enquire Now

SMARTWORLD ONE DXP

Smart World One DXP is a visionary residential project poised to redefine urban living in the heart of Gurugram. 

Located in the dynamic sector of Dwarka Expressway, this development offers a perfect blend of connectivity, convenience, and contemporary lifestyle amenities. Smart World One DXP presents a range of thoughtfully designed residences, from stylish apartments to spacious penthouses, each exuding modern elegance and functionality. Residents will enjoy a plethora of world-class amenities, including a fitness center, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, clubhouse, and dedicated play areas for children. 

The project also emphasizes sustainability with eco-friendly features integrated throughout the design. With its strategic location, luxurious offerings, and commitment to creating a vibrant community, Smart World One DXP stands as a symbol of modern urban living, promising residents a life of comfort, convenience, and connectivity.

Enquire Now
